name: splash-plate
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Water moves by 20%. Held by a Multitype Pokémon: Holder’s type becomes Water.
short_effect: Held: Water-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus’s and Judgment’s type to Water.

flavor_text.sword-shield: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a stone tablet that boosts the power of Water-type moves.
